channel.title: 2006 2 Lives [Pre-Alpha]: Daily Development Log Updates
channel.description:
[center][img]http://img22.imageshack.us/img22/9560/lkrw.jpg[/img] [size=18pt][b]Pre-Alpha[/b][/size][/center] [center][size=12pt]Oldschool Development Thread[/size][/center] Hello, Moparscape viewers! This is 2006 Lives 2 a professional 2006 remake, that will knock you off your feets, literally! *Not really*. This server will contain every aspect of runescape back in 2006. We will have: [b]Quests, Quest Points, Minigames, Bosses, Eco, skills, and everything other you can imagine![/b] This is a PI, and will always be. This is 2006Lives, and I am the rightful owner of this remake. I plan on developing this server for 2 years which is my goal. The reason being long is when I get 18, I will buy a good VPS and host this for many years. The longer I wait, will depend on Runescape's actions. So you I hope you can depend on this server. This will always be a solo project, keep this in mind. I will be hosting this around 6 hours a day, incase you ever wanted to join. [center][size=12pt]Oldschool Development Log Style[/size][/center]
Date: what has been done: Media: Future Plans:
[b]Date:[/b] July 12 2013 [b]what has been done:[/b] 1) Packaging source files, making it better, learning how to use couple Java basics. 2) Worked on improving Dialogue. 3) Started viewing some files. [b]Media:[/b] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/pg6AVrS.png[/img] [b]Future Plans:[/b] 1) Packaging more 2) Start viewing every single file. :o [b]Date:[/b] July 13 2013 [b]what has been done:[/b] 1) This weekend I will dedicate myself to adding a real Rs like Membership :). *Includes, days, members item, members cities, and also ofc, members world.* [b]Media:[/b] None. :( [b]Future Plans:[/b] 1) Viewing every file on this server. [b]Date:[/b] July 14 2013 [b]what has been done:[/b] 1) Packaging source files, making it better, learning how to use couple Java basics. 2) Worked on improving Dialogue. 3) Started viewing some files. [b]Media:[/b] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/pg6AVrS.png[/img] [b]Future Plans:[/b] 1) Packaging more 2) Start viewing every single file. :o [b]Date:[/b] July 15 2013 [b]what has been done:[/b] 1) This weekend I will dedicate myself to adding a real Rs like Membership :). *Includes, days, members item, members cities, and also ofc, members world.* 2) Finished adding every pickable objects. 3) Finished every 2006 global item spawns. 4) Adding player combat clipping. 5) Adding all working single and double doors. 6) Adding all ladders. [b]Media:[/b] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0wLAHrY.png[/img] [b]Future Plans:[/b] 1) Viewing every file on this server. This will be just like runescape 2006, EVERY SINGLE THING!!

item.title: 2006 2 Lives [Pre-Alpha]: Daily Development Log Updates
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Yet another development that will fail. You changed the name of the project 3 times in the post, you have hardly anything to show, you’re using a shitty and slow base, you’re adding members content before you have hardly any free to play content, and you’re focusing on code formatting. This won’t go anywhere.

Read full topic

item.title: 2006 2 Lives [Pre-Alpha]: Daily Development Log Updates
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

[quote=“south-park, post:17, topic:524767”]I would switch to something better other then PI when you have the chance. I would of switched to something better if I wasn’t this far into development with mine. :([/quote]its never too far to improve core aspects. just look into networking, and fix the core design itself.

@op; the picture of code:

public String npcName() { String npcName; if (client.npcType < 1) { npcName = ""; } else { npcName = NPCHandler.NpcList[client.npcType].npcName; return npcName; }the way you’re using this, will need to be called every time consecutively with the npcType variable.

much easier to cast it into a getter

public String getNpcName(int npc) { return (npc > 0) ? NPCHandler.NpcList[npc].npcName : ""; }should work?

also good luck

Read full topic
